description: The reference frame or system from which vertical distances (altitudes or depths) are measured.
title: verticalDatum

___verticalResolution.description: The minimum distance possible between two adjacent altitude or depth values, expressed in units of measure.

___encodingMethod.description: The means used to encode the altitudes.

___unitOfMeasure.description: The units of measure for altitude or depth measurements.

___isDepthSystem.description: True if depth system, false if altitude system.

___description.description: A natural language description of the meaning of the identifier value.

___namespace.description: A string which unambiguously defines the namespace for the identifier.

___identifier.description: A name that is used to identify the resource.

___authority.description: Citation for the authority issuing the identifier.

___datumIdentifier.description: The identification given to the surface taken as the surface of reference from which altitudes or depths are measured.
